Code: EXEC SQL SELECT 'ICATU        ', T2.VLRESGATE, T2.SITUACAO, T1.NRSERTIT, T2.DTCREDITO FROM SEGUROS.V0TITCAPVG T1, SEGUROS.V0RESGFDCAPVA T2 WHERE T1.NRCERTIF = :NRCERTIF AND T1.NRCERTIF = T2.NRCERTIF UNION SELECT 'CAIXA SEGUROS', T4.VLRESGATE, T4.SITUACAO, T4.NRTITFDCAP, T4.DTMOVTO FROM SEGUROS.V0TITFDCAPVA T3, SEGUROS.V0RESGFDCAPVA T4 WHERE T3.NRCERTIF = :NRCERTIF AND T4.NRTITFDCAP = T3.NRTITFDCAP END SQL
